title: Search hit variations API
Description: It provides the highest increase and decrease between 2 periods in a given market.

inputs.name: market
inputs.description: 2-letter IATA country code of the point of sale

inputs.name: month_a
inputs.description: month of interest for the travel date, formatted as YYYY-MM

inputs.name: month_b
inputs.description: month to be compared with, as travel date formatted as YYYY-MM

outputs.name: top_up_destinations
outputs.description: top 50 destination cities with greatest relative increase

outputs.name: top_down_destinations
outputs.description: top 50 destination cities with greatest relative decrease

outputs.name: top_up_onds
outputs.description: top 50 origin and destination pairs of cities with greatest relative increase

outputs.name: top_down_onds
outputs.description: top 50origin and destination pairs of cities with greatest relative decrease
